creator: William Shakespeare
description:
LibriVox recording of Favourite Scenes From Shakespeare by William Shakespeare.
Read in English by Beth Thomas; Michele Eaton; Sonia; Tony Addison; John Burlinson
In 2012, the World Shakespeare Festival surveyed Britons as to their favourite plays by Shakespeare. This collection consists of 21 scenes from the most popular plays written by arguably the greatest writer in the English language, possibly any language. It is an homage to the Bard in celebration of the 400th anniversary of his death in 1616 -- the Shakespeare Sesquicentennial. - Summary by John Burlinson

Roles performed by: Beth Thomas, Michele Eaton, Sonia, Tony Addison and John Burlinson
Editing done mainly by Michele Eaton and John Burlinson

For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;Shakespeare; dramatic reading; renaissance; Elizabethan
